responses.question2: Video almost always felt essential for me, but most with the drywall. It was extremely hard to determine from data alone whether the drywall was being cut or measured.
responses.question3: I don't know if it was every essential except for the few times when I couldn't see what was going on in the video. The data helped a bit at that point. It was very difficult for me to determine from data alone what was happening.
responses.question4: The ability to slow the video down was most helpful.
